Headline: #28 Stony Island Temporary Southbound Reroute near Stony Island/69th
ShortDescription: SB 28 Stony Island buses are temporarily rerouted via Stony Island, 67th, Dorchester, 75th and Stony Island, due to street blockage near Stony Island/69th.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
How does this affect my trip?

Southbound #28 Stony Island buses are temporarily rerouted via Stony Island, 67th, Dorchester, 75th, then resume their normal route on Stony Island, due to street blockage near Stony Island/69th.

Northbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #26 South Shore Express Temporary Southbound Reroute near South Shore Drive/82nd
ShortDescription: SB 26 South Shore Express buses are rrtd via South Shore Drive, Exchange, 83rd & over their normal route, due to street blockage near South Shore Drive/82nd.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
How does this affect my trip?

Southbound #26 South Shore Express buses are temporarily rerouted via South Shore Drive, Exchange, 83rd, then resume over their normal route, due to street blockage near South Shore Drive/82nd.

Northbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.
